attributes.action: Money for Troops equipment not for people who have a kids to get a house and benefits
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Money for Troops equipment not for Chavs that have kids to get a house and benefits

I am a member of the Armed Forces and i think its a disgrace that people get benefits for having kids just because they know they will get money from the government. All the time we are struggling in Afghan because we cant get the correct equipment.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement. Please rephrase your title and resubmit.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
